channel.title: Chat color
channel.description: I was wondering if it would be possible to make it so donators have a different colored public chat. Like if you're a donator and you say something, it's green, but you don't have to do green: before you talk, it automatically makes it green. I've seen servers with this, so I know it's possible, I'm on a Delta source.

item.title: Chat color
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

What kind of client do you have?

I know of some clients (usually 317s) that use “@gre@” (without quotes) to turn the chat in the box green, while other clients (such as my 562) that use “<col=00ff00>” (without quotes) to turn the same text green.

Note: the <col=XXXXXX> is extremely versatile as those 6 digits are actually the hexadecimal value for the given color. 00ff00 is actually the value for standard green. Changing 00ff00 to 00ff01 could have minute differences, but either way, it’s very customizable.

Read full topic

item.title: Chat color

item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Only the text in the box.

item.title: Chat color
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

How much text do you want green? Just the text above the person’s head, the text in the actual chat box, or both?

Read full topic
